title: Violent Violet
description: In a typical rural town in the Midwest filled with good people, rednecks, and maladjusted youths, Violet is a death rock girl in her late teens. Between her friends, some vampires, and a vampire hunter, her life is spiraling out of control. While struggling with the loss of her parents to a car accident, as well as her chaotic and abusive lifestyle, she meets a mysterious man named Roman, whom she is drawn to for reasons she doesnâ€™t quite understand. As mysterious events begin to unfold around her, she discovers a secret about Roman, drawing her closer to the dark world he inhabits. He is her champion and may be the key to unlocking the secret of who she truly is. What they learn changes the course of their lives forever.
author: Tara Vanflower
